metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10393 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
bark_noise_hybridmp in psy.c in Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.6 has a stack-basedbuffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10393` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvorbis0a - 1.3.6-2
libvorbisenc2 - 1.3.6-2
libvorbisfile3 - 1.3.6-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvorbis package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6-2').
